name: Worst Roadtrip of all Twine
description:
"Look!" cries Steve, the dreadful asshole who married your mom. "The World's Largest Ball of twine!"

Dread pools in the pit of your stomach. You've been in this car for ten hours already and this would be a massive detour. If you can just derail him for long enough he'll be forced  to turn around to make it to the motel by midnight.

Currently featuring SIX different endings!

Warning: This is super janky.
